turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order two pizzas from Bella Luna, please. I want to order two small pizzas. I want one of them to be a Hawaiian with extra ham, and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order 2 pizzas from Bella Luna ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want the second one to be a chicken bacon ranch pizza with onions. Yes. And I want both of them to have big crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas, 1 with hawaiian with extra ham, extra cheese, and second one with chicken bacon ranch with onion is that your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you please repeat the details for me, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Both with thick crust, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure let me do that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small pizzas, 1 with hawaiian with extra ham, extra cheese, and second one with chicken bacon ranch with onion all with thick crust, final order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok your total comes to 24 dollars with 2 small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
